items.name: init<H>(H)
items.desc: Creates a type-erased hashable value that wraps the given instance.

items.name: var base: Any
items.desc: The value wrapped by this instance.

items.name: var customMirror: Mirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for this instance.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: static func != (AnyHashable, AnyHashable) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: static func == (AnyHashable, AnyHashable) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two type-erased hashable instances wrap the same value.
